sorular.soru: Which sign indicates a junction of equal flows?

feedback.metin: Sign 1, the green-white chevron sign indicates a junction of equal flows. For example, this sign is placed at a junction of a motorway. Sign 2, the black and white striped sign indicates a narrowing or end of the hard shoulder. Sign 3 warns of a sharp turn.

sorular.soru: After which sign should you expect pedestrians?

feedback.metin: Only at sign G-5 (erf) and J-23 (warning of pedestrians) should you expect pedestrians. These signs both indicate that you should expect pedestrians on the carriageway. Within an erf, pedestrians are allowed to use the entire width of the road. And sign J-23 is often used in places where pedestrians must cross the road or use the carriageway. Sign C-16 indicates a declaration of closure to pedestrians. So, pedestrians are not allowed to use this road. Sign G-3 indicates an autoweg. Pedestrians are also not allowed here either.

sorular.soru: In what situation should you give way to the other road user?

feedback.metin: In the upper left situation, you are approaching priority triangles and sign B6. This means that you must give way to drivers on the intersecting road. Because a pedestrian is not a driver, you do not have to give way to them. In the upper right situation, the cyclist is coming from the right relative to you. It is an equivalent intersection. The speed bump markings or a different kind of hard road surface such as cobblestones, do not change a thing about this. You must give way to the cyclist. In the lower left situation, the cyclist is coming from the right relative to you. It is an equivalent intersection where you must give way to drivers coming from the right. You must give way to the cyclist. In the lower right situation, the moped rider is approaching priority triangles where they must give way to drivers on the intersecting road. You do not have to give way to the moped rider.

sorular.soru: Which dashboard light indicates that you have the rear fog lights on?

feedback.metin: The left light indicates that you have dipped headlights on. The middle light that you have the rear fog lights on and the right light that the front fog lights are on.

sorular.soru: Which sign indicates that you have to go straight ahead?

feedback.metin: Sign A indicates a mandatory direction of travel to the left or right. So you are not allowed to go straight ahead here. Sign B indicates a diversion route, but this is not a mandatory direction. Sign C indicates a one-way street. You are not obligated to enter this road, you may also turn left or right if possible. Sign D indicates a mandatory direction of travel straight ahead. Sign E indicates a prohibition on u-turning.
